com.yahoo.labs.samoa.utils

Class SamzaConfigFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.utils.SamzaConfigFactory

  • public class SamzaConfigFactory
extends Object
    Generate Configs that will be used to submit Samza jobs from the input topology (one config per PI/EntrancePI in the topology)
    Author:
    Anh Thu Vu
